title: AE/PR插件-添加或去除RGB色彩偏移分离特效EFX Chromatic Aberration 2.0.0 Win/Mac
author: 大众脸
content: EFX Chromatic Aberration 2.0.0 是一款专为 After Effects 和 Premiere 设计的插件，用于添加或去除 RGB 色彩偏移分离特效。该插件支持对红、绿、蓝三个通道进行独立的任意偏移调整，可实现精确控制的视觉效果。适用于需要模拟镜头色差或创造特殊艺术风格的视频制作场景。
supported_versions: After Effects CS6 及更高版本，Premiere CS6 及更高版本

other.additional_info: This plugin lets you apply (or remove) the chromatic aberration effect to a layer. It allows independent adjustment of RGB channel shifts for creative color effects.
